author: virtualastronomer
description: Description: A Python implementation of the Simple Application Messaging ProtocolHomepage URL: SAMPy at IASFVersion: 1.2SAMPy is a python implementation of the Simply Application Messaging Protocol adopted by the International Virtual Observatory Alliance for enabling communications between unrelated desktop (and in the future browser based) applications.  In practicum, a SAMP hub allows tools such as TOPCAT, Aladin and with SAMPy, Python to interact and exchange tables of data or images or spectra.
title: SAMPy
